law.catch_line: Authority to control other holdings -- Cost.
law.text: The secretary for energy and environment is authorized to carry out control work on other adjacent or interior holdings, which, if uncontrolled, would cause a reinfestation or reinfection of the controlled area, and to contract with owners of land in the affected area relative to payment of the cost of such work.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 171, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 142, sec. 14, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 95, sec. 5, effective June 16, 1960.
